item.title: Remove Asterisk from Linux server (ubuntu/centos/debian/rhel)
item.description: The following removal instructions go over how to completely remove Asterisk from your Linux Instance. REMOVE AND REINSTALL INSTRUCTIONS Here is how to remove Asterisk from a LinuxÂ server and reinstall from source. Pre-requirements: Download source, configure, make menuselect_, and make. All done with root (sudo su) Example:_ sudo su<br /> ###ENTER ROOT PASSWORD###<br /> mkdir ~/build<br /> cd ~/build<br /> wget https://downloads.asterisk.org/pub/telephony/asterisk/asterisk-14-current.tar.gz<br /> tar -xvf asterisk-14-current.tar.gz<br /> cd asterisk-14<br /> .
